changeSet.author: Aleksandr
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE rooms ( number IDENTITY PRIMARY KEY, type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, price_per_night FLOAT NOT NULL, status ENUM('FREE', 'OCCUPIED') NOT NULL )

changeSet.author: Aleksandr
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO rooms (type, price_per_night, status) VALUES ('standard', 10.0, 'OCCUPIED'), ('standard', 10.0, 'FREE'), ('deluxe', 20.0, 'FREE'), ('family', 15.0, 'OCCUPIED'), ('superior', 17.0, 'FREE')
